name: No Experience
description:
No Experience is top down shooter, with some horde based enemies that explode. Currently, I am hoping to develop this into a roguelite type game, however that is subject to change.

This game has been in on and off development for a few months, and I feel that mechanically it could be considered sound. This is my first game that has sufficient depth to be what I would consider an interesting game, but I would love to get feedback from anyone who would like to download and play it.

This Game has been developed with the help of Tom Francis, through his "Make a Game with no experience" series on game development in GameMaker Studio.

I would also like to thank Humble Bundle for providing the GameMaker bundle that significantly reduced the cost to get GameMaker.
